long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Sci-Hub Access Chrome extension empowers users to seamlessly retrieve scientific journal articles by leveraging the Sci-Hub database. With a simple installation, a padlock icon appears next to journal names and DOI numbers on relevant websites. Clicking the padlock provides immediate access to the paper, eliminating unnecessary navigation barriers. In cases where the padlock is absent, users can conveniently select the DOI links, right-click, and choose the "Open PDF" option to access the desired article. Unlock the world of scientific knowledge effortlessly with the Sci-Hub Access extension. Please use this extension responsibly and make sure it's in compliance with copyright regulations.

The extension should work on various websites that list scientific articles and provide DOI links.
Look for the padlock icon or the "Open PDF" option in the right-click menu to access papers easily.


Important Notes:
The extension facilitates access to scientific papers through Sci-Hub. Be aware of copyright and intellectual property laws when using this extension.

Always give proper credit to the original authors and publishers of the papers you access.
The availability of papers through Sci-Hub can vary, and some papers might not be accessible.
If you happen to have any issues or have feedback, you can contact the extension developer for support.


Please remember to use the extension responsibly and in accordance with the laws and regulations regarding copyright and intellectual property. Always respect the work of researchers and authors.
